directions: Trim fat from pork butt. Cut into chunks and place in a large saucepan.  Add water, onion, garlic, bay leaf, salt, peppercorns and chile pepper.  Bring to a boil; skim foam from surface. Reduce heat, cover and simmer for 1 hour.
Drain broth, let meat cool and shred with a fork.  Refrigerate overnight if desired.
title: Pork for Tamales
